== Feisty Fawn ==
Installed Ubuntu 7.04 (Feisty Fawn). Everything works. RAM/CPU detected and working. LAN auto-detected, sound fully functional, USB too. No problems.

Didn't tried other Ubuntu (Kubuntu, EDUbuntu...) versions.
